content.title: No error on indirect calls
Fix handling of string enums on LHS of `+=`
Fix block-scoped capturing by class elements inside iteration statements
Add separate PrivateIdentifier and SourceFile constructors
New --emitExtension and --noImplicitExtensionName compiler options
Allow inference to explore multiple instances of the same symbol
Fix conditional type type parameter leak
capture thisArg of optionalChaining in parens
Type comparison when conditional type is target
fix receiver on calls of imported and exported functions
Improve error message for `==` of two different types
Allow identical type parameter lists to merge in union signatures
add support to convert lambda to function and vice-versa
Mapped symbol
Allowed non-this, non-super code before super call in derived classes with property initializers
narrow by instanceof: infer type parameters from original type
expose jsdoc factory
Fix #30557 Narrow non-declared unions by discriminant
During inference break down unions on the target side before unions on the source side
Improve error message for invalid return type of JSX component
Better typings for Promise, like #31117
Better typings for Promise.all(), like #31117
Better typings for Promise.then(), like #31117
Better typings for Promise.resolve(), like #31117
Only apply indexed access write simplifications to types that arise from mutation
Fix #31319 : Narrow unit-unit inequality tests using comparability
fix #32843 : evaluate right scope when checked if all type parameter …
Higher order this parameter inference, like #31116
Corrected ES5 for-in destructuring binding emit
Class emit: cached repeat prototype sets in a variable
Unify logic in typeof narrowing
Improve non-ambient class and function merge error
fix: add this type for Reflect.defineProperty
Better typings for Array.concat(), etc.
Fix goto implementation does not suggest all subtypes
Emit comments and newlines only once even with initializers added by the transformer
Add an overload to Object.freeze that preserves literal types
expose getOptionalType and getNonOptionalType
Cache global tagged template objects
Added error when Enum member initaliser references itself
Sort emitted declarations of union types.
Fix Number.is* to accept unknown again
Add union of replacer function and string
disallows exponential operator with BigInt for targets lower than ES2016
Fix: convertFunctionToEs6Class cannot recognize `x.prototype = {}` pattern
Defer generic awaited type
Make never rest type top-like
fix(lib/es2015): Fix definition of `ProxyHandler`
Fixed issue with unreported error on missing method call in if test.
Fixes non-null assertion applied to type narrowed to never not issuing an error.
feat(lib/es2015): Add typed overloads to `Reflect`
fix(refactor): keep comments after refactor
Prefer a likely literal over anonymous type in --noImplicitAny codefixes
Remove usage of non-standardised `Reflect.decorate`.
fix(33836): VSCode - generate accessors fixup on readonly field removes modifier
Improve error message when comparing non-comparable types
Add link to documentation in tsconfig.json template generated by tsc --init
Instantiate `this` in non-super property/element access expressions
fix(helpers): Use `hasOwnProperty.call`
fix(37150): private field should not conflict with string index type
Merge diagnosticsProducing and nonDiagnosticsProducing checkers into a single checker supporting lazy diagnostics
Add ToggleLineComment and ToggleMultilineComment service
Allow specifying TReturn and TNext for AsyncIterableIterator and AsyncIterable
Fix handling of templates in preProcessFile
fix: imports/exports/require with template literal tokens
Fix missing `undefined` checks
Do not parse template arguments in JavaScript files.
fix(33054): noUnusedLocals not working with array destructuring assignment in for-loop
fix(37039): Support 'in' type guard of intersections
Added runtime TypeError for non-function, non-null __extends
Fix the error when use spread arguments twice
feat(36266): async function needs Promise<T> return type quick fix
Support top level "for await of"
Enable excess property checking on spread assignment
Allow Source Mapping inside destructuring assignment
Add missing relationship allowing a type to be assignable to a conditional when assignable to both branches
Do not measure variance for a conditional type extendsType
Add shim for ES Promise
Delete the {} and unconstrained type parameter assignability rule
Accurate Array.prototype.flat definition
Added quick-fix to rewrite index access as call to get/set method.
Revert "Revert "Support declaration emit for late bound element acces…
Fix parsing nested parameter types of `@callback` JSDoc tag
Hide function type missing props if return and target type same.
Assignability should check an index signature or rest type of the source against optional properties of the target.
Improved 'nameless' JSDoc typedef support.
Add ReadonlyArray overload to Array.isArray
Quick fix for functions lacking return expressions
Fix relations for instantiations of same generic signature
fix(37165): Cannot read property 'flags' of undefined
Simplify extension priorities and move dts to lowest priority
Update __exportStar helper to skip default and __esModule members
feat: add util {is,create,update}DynamicImport
Add use-before-def error for uninitialized property
Change default for TNext in Iterator/AsyncIterator
Fix contextual types for maybe-async callbacks
fix(37364): No completions in string literal index on mapped type
fix(36909): wrong error message when trying to named-import an export
feat(37092): Improve error when default-importing from a module that `export *`s from a module with a default export
